abstract: Exelon said Thursday it raised its bid for rival power producer NRG Energy to about $7.5 billion in stock, marking the latest twist in the months-long takeover feud.
snippet: Exelon said Thursday it raised its bid for rival power producer NRG Energy to about $7.5 billion in stock, marking the latest twist in the months-long takeover feud.
lead_paragraph: Update | 10:12 a.m.  Exelon said Thursday it raised its hostile bid for rival power producer NRG Energy to nearly $7.5 billion in stock, marking the latest twist in the months-long takeover feud.

headline.main: Exelon Raises Hostile Bid for NRG
